title: Eileen Gu Defended Her Gold. Then She Made History.
summary: Six Olympic medals. The most decorated freestyle skier ever. She is 22.
content:
On the final day of Milan Cortina, Eileen Gu dropped into the halfpipe and did what she came to do.

Gold. Again. The same event she won in Beijing four years ago.

## 6 | Career Olympic medals for Gu

The most by any freestyle skier — man or woman — in Olympic history. She is **22 years old.**

She left Beijing in 2022 with two golds and a silver. She leaves Italy with three more medals, including this one — **the one that mattered most.**

>> "I feel like I've really found peace with myself and my skiing." — Eileen Gu

The halfpipe final wasn't close. Gu's first run was enough to win. Her second was better. Her third was a victory lap.

Tonight the flame goes out. The closing ceremony ends Milan Cortina 2026. Gu will walk out as the face of these Games.

!! Six medals. Twenty-two years old. And she makes it look like the mountain is performing for her.
